Text: hi TvTeam, can you please add the rest of the tv series as well, if you have it available?

Classification: Documentary
Genre: Family | Lifestyle
Status: New Series
Network: BBC THREE ( United Kingdom)
Airs: Wednesdays at 09:00 pm
Runtime: 60 Minutes
Premiere: February 06, 2013

People Like Us is a documentary series which is filmed over one long summer a vibrant mix of feisty, witty and headstrong young people from the Manchester suburb called Harpurhey allow us into their secret world and show us what it’s really like growing up the hard way.
